word:
In Humility and Faith [READ AT THE LOS ANGELES, 
       CALIFORNIA, CAMP MEETING, AUGUST 15-31, 1907, AND 
          AFTERWARD PUBLISHED IN THE TRACT, JEHOVAH 
    IS OUR KING.] 


     Special instruction has been given me for God's people, for perilous times are upon us. In the world, destruction and violence are increasing. In the church, man power is gaining the ascendancy; those who have been chosen to occupy positions of trust think it their prerogative to rule.
